import React from "react"; import { useParams, Link, Outlet, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function Sucess() { const location = useLocation(); const cost = location.state.totalcost; const count = location.state.counts; const theater = location.state.theatre; const time = location.state.time; const date = location.state.date; const name = location.state.name; const title = location.state.title; const app = location.state.payoption; const photo = location.state.photo; var num = cost / count; return ( <>

{name}

,Your Tickets are successfully booked

Payment through:

{app}

Movie Name :

{title}

No.of Tickets :

{count}

Total Cost :

{cost}/-

Theatre :

{theater}

Date :

{date}

Show Time :

{time}

); } export default Sucess;
